long_description: The REI Compact Zoom 8-17 x 25 binoculars are an outstanding value and deliver a broad zoom range along with great magnification and clarity. They are small and light enough to go just about anywhere. Fully multicoated lenses using antireflective coatings provide superb light transmission, even in low light. F4 prisms enhance image quality, brightness and resolution. Rubber armor and weather resistance accommodate rugged use in the field.
short_description: The REI Compact Zoom 8-17 x 25 binoculars are an outstanding value and deliver a broad zoom range along with great magnification and clarity. They are small and light enough to go just about anywhere.
